author: Bloomberg
title: Old Restaurant Chains Get a Second Look from Quarantined America
description: Some brands that were flagging last year are now hiring as fast as they can.
content: (Bloomberg)Decades-old pizza and chicken-wing chains are seeing a revival thanks to confined U.S. consumers. Exhausted parents and bored 20-somethings are turning to older restaurant chains like Papa Johns International Inc. and Wingstop Inc. for delivery and… [+1734 chars]
